original_text: And immediately I was in the spirit: and, behold, a throne was set in heaven, and one sat on the throne.
korean_text: 내가 곧 성령에 감동되었더니 보라 하늘에 보좌를 베풀었고 그 보좌 위에 앉으신 이가 있는데

sentences.original_text: And immediately I was in the spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 즉시 영 안에 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: a throne was set in heaven
and one sat on the throne
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 한 분이 보좌에 앉아 계셨습니다
